name: Risky Jump Journey
description:
Jump duck and dodge the traps and get through all 20 levels to win! But if you lose... it is back to the beginning for you. But.....

If you are not a fan " game overs" and total restarts, I have also made a different file called "Risky Jump Jouney: No Limits" It is the same game but re-programmed to give players unlimited attempts to complete each level.

HOWEVER... the game does not have a saving feature, if you exit the game you will lose your current progress. The link to "Risky Jump Jouney: No Limits" is in the link below.

https://yuneek.itch.io/risky-jump-journey-no-limits-mode

Thank you for playing my game!
